content.detailedDescription: I was driving down south hulen headed home when i saw these lights.I thought  it was an air plane but, after getting a closer look while it was floating across the sky it was maybe 600 to 700 feet in the air. but, what caught my attention was the positioning of the lights on the  unknown craft. it had 3 solid white lights on each end and it was shaped like a triangle. in between the white lights appeared red flashing lights. it did not make any noise it just floated on by,i had never seen anything that moved like that without making any sound.I could'nt believe it. it shook me up.The craft was moving quickly and quietly through the sky.I lost visual after it went about 2 to 3 miles down the road headed east over highway 20. i lost sight of the craft after about 2 mins it had gone about 2 to 3 miles from my position.
content.summary: I was driving down south hulen home when i saw these lights   i thought was an air plane but, after getting a closer look.

content.detailedDescription:
While lounging outside, looked up and saw large airplane flying west to east. if due north on a level plane is 9 o'clock and due south on a plane is 3 o'clock and hades is at 6, then the airplane was flying at about 11. while observing the airplane, i noticed what seemed to be an extra part hanging off of one of the wings and wondered if the plane was coming apart. then the piece, which was not much larger than a dot, moved so that it appeared as if it were flying between the airplane's south (near) wing and its tail. that's when i realized it was a separate, flying object. as i watched the dot seemed to vanish for a moment and then i noticed it now flying just in front of the aircraft. they both then passed over the cleveland avenue hill extremely close together. i checked my watch, which read 7:56 pm.

it seemed way to small to be a regular aircraft. the airplane's apparent length was slightly less than the diameter of a dime held at arm's length. the object flying around it  appeared smaller than any of the engines. 

my emotional state can perhaps be best described as a lower-case wtf? 

if any reports of a large plane being buzzed come in for tonight, you've got ground corroboration.
content.summary: Small object seen dodging airplane.

content.detailedDescription:
1. 1030pm wed nt 1030pm 9//2010. location tamms rd, ophir oregon.
  went outside of my rv to to turn off electric generator. as i was walking towards the gen i noticed a triangular object with 3 flashing lights and 3 long white lights connecting appear to be coming west to east over the pacific ocean. it started real high up in the sky. as the object got lower and closer it appeared to lose control. it performed many sharp fast dives,rises....I have video that requires enhancing that covers about an hour time with narration. after the first nine minutes of filming this i went into my rv and got my 5mw green laser pointer. i shined the pointer towards the object for about 45 mins. gave it the morse code signals. the object appeared top respond to my laser by changing direction and coming towards my location. the object appeared to make to almost to the coast line when it suddenly turned around and headed off at a high rate of speed. 
   i will upload multi media videos from my cellphone.
   my friend also observed the same manuvers as i did. this went on until approx 12:15pm. i went to sleep then..
   at about 1:30am or so i was awaken by a bright brilliant light shining into my rv, the white was a color that i have never seen on this planet. looked out my rv window pulling up the shade. it looked like a bright white object was sitting in this old mill parking area. so bright. i went out dressed in my shorts and by that time then object was up in the air about 500 feet above the ground. the white light almost looked like a force filed holding the large silverly object up in the air. watched it for a bit and went inside sooon there after the bright light was gone.
   hope it comes back this eve got my laser ready. ready to make first contact!
content.summary: 2 people watch object over pacifc ocean.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog at walnut hill park in new 
britain ct. this morning 9/2/2010 it was starting to get brighter out but sill dark. i noticed what looked like a star very bright moving quickly across the sky and as i looked again i noticed there was another one right behind it just as bright. i have seen satellites at night moving and these moved much quicker and they were much brighter. there was no sound and i could visually see that there was no body such as a plane. as they went by it seemed that the first one flickered to almost dissapeared. the trees got in my way to see any more. i looked for satellite flyby times on the internet in the area but couldnt find any at that time. they seemed to be even brighter than the iss! i wasnt afraid of these whatever they were but i am very curious as to waht they were..Maybe they were satellites and maybe they werent .
content.summary: Star like very bright moving across sky quickly and then another one was right behind it.

content.detailedDescription:
The ufo of these two photos, one captured on 17 dec 2009 and another on 11 jan 2010. both pictures taken with a shutter speed of 1/1000 of a second.  the objects look large in size. from one picture you can see some orange & white light emitted from one end of the ufo.

this case is one of my long term visitation, more details from: [link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Mysterious ufo object.

content.detailedDescription: I was at our family condo in crescent bar just sitting on out on our covered porch enjoying the night. i was just people watching and relaxing when the family of 20 people out on lawn chairs where watching the stars and chatting amongst themselves.I heard gasping and screaming at first i didn't go look up till the little girls started screaming ufo! i hopped up and went to the edge of our porch looked up as all of us were and a silent star like ufo floated over at maybe 1300 ft or 1500ft,it was moving at about 30 to 40miles per hour.It was silent we all would have heard if it was a plane ,military planes fly over low sometimes training during the day but it is so loud you would jump out of bed so no its not a plane! it went over the surrounding mountains so didnt see it for longer than 30 secs.We were all just standing there like amazed,i was only there for two days and i saw a ufo so must be a hot spot.I looked on the map and crescent bar is directly north of a military base.I can't wait to go back on vacation i'm gonna bring a video camera.
content.summary: I didnt go look up at the sky till the little girls started to screaming ufo!

content.detailedDescription: I took my dog out at about 4:30 am, and saw a strange light in the sky, i thought it might just be a star, though it looked something like a cigar or cylinder shape? anyway, i was tried, so i went back to bed, just laid down, that's when i saw a flash of green light, and a voice that spoke in some strange language that i never heard before? i couldn't move, i felt my dog up against me, but she never moved or barked? i tried very hard to move my arms and feet, but it was like having sleep paralysis, but i knew i was wide awake!? i definitely felt, and caught climpses of the presence of small shadowy figures in the bedroom? i knew i was trying to push them away from my face? i didn't feel as though i was in my bedroom anymore? the next thing i knew it was 6:04 when i woke up? i knew what happened wasn't a dream, because a little over an hour and 1/2 had passed since i saw the light in the sky, and i had just laid back down in my bed, and then it was 6:04? this is the 7th time in my life that something like this has happened to me that i know of, there may be other times that i don't remember? it felt so very real, and the strange thing was, i didn't feel afraid? i don't know what the green light said to me in the strange language, though i think now i may have heard it before, hut i wasn't afraid of it somehow? it all felt so familiar, yet i can't remember what exactly just happened to me? i feel as though i have went through this many many times before?  [name removed/cms/tg].
content.summary: I was walking my dog, saw a strange light in the sky, went back inside the house, went to bed.

content.detailedDescription: My teen-aged son, his friend, and i were star gazing when we noticed a high number of moving lights in the sky that were obviously airplanes. southern oregon is not noted for many airplanes at night. in fact seeing 1 is uncommon, 2 is very rare. on this night we counted 5 roughly at the same time. 3 moving south, 2 of which at a high rate of speed, and 2 moving in an easterly direction. the 3 moving south and 1 of the easterly lights were obviously airplanes due to the straight line flight and the blinking lights. one of the easterly lights was farther away but obviously larger and brighter than all of the other lights. as we were watching it, we took our eyes off of it for 2 - 3 seconds to see where the other aircraft had went. when we looked back, it was gone. the sky was clear and devoid of any clouds. temp was approx. 70 degrees.
content.summary: Light moving in an easterly direction vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
1. my mother had called me at about 9:45 pm on august the 28th and told me there was a strange light outside that was making very strange movements and flashing weird coloured lights. she lives in bakersfield and i live in kernville (which is about 40 some odd miles to the west of bakersfield i believe) and she asked me to go outside and see if i could see it. after telling me where to look and after describing what i was seeing (flashing red/green/blue/amber lights and erratic side to side/circular/up and down movements/hovering) we realized we were both seeing the same object.

she had also seen it the object (as did i) on the 29th, 30th and today (the 2nd of sep) with similar things happening.

2. see above

3. i did not believe it was an aircraft/star/ planet/ or any other type of man made object as it was way too bright to be any kind of aircraft and planets and stars just dont move like that, i believe it is a ufo

4. as stated above it is extremely bright, brighter than any stars in the sky (in bakersfield the sky is so smoggy its pretty much impossible to see any stars or anything in the sky) and it was moving in circular/side to side/up and down motions and seemed to be hovering.

5. no strange feelings etc

6. i had gone to bed around 11-11:30 that night but my mother had said it had just vanished around 11:45-midnight. we had not noticed it vanishing on any of the other days as we had gone to bed before it vanished. she had said that it just kinda disappeared from sight... like it was there one second and gone another.
content.summary: Bright yellow light with 7 points flashing red/blue/amber/green and moving erratically.

content.detailedDescription:
This may not be a saucer siting as per say, but it is a unusual siting for me.

i was walking home from a neighbors house when i saw a string of lights in the sky.  there were five lights that i could see.  they moved like they were on a string and independent of each other, i have never seen anything like this.  they were very bright, a bit brighter than the stars that were out this night.  

when i got home, i asked my son if he wanted to see a ufo.  after checking it out for a minute or two, he called another neighbor of mine, an they came outside to see this strange event.  

we watched them for awhile, than they started to fade out, kind of like they were getting higher in the atmosphere, then we lost site of them.  i saw them for about half an hour or so.

this occurred at about 10 pm on 9/1/10, appleton, wi.

sorry no photos or vids.
content.summary: 5 lights connected.

content.detailedDescription: Spotted extremely shiny disc shape metallic object out of passenger car window while driving north on highway 99 just after turning off of highway 5 north, object appeared east of sacramento municipal airport, object was saucer shape with dome top, object was close enough or big enough to see full outline, was stationary for 1 min. before disappearing
content.summary: Bright metalic saucer shaped object with domed top.

content.detailedDescription:
Phone interview taken by margie kay in the words of the witness: 

i was walking from my car to a restaurant when something in the sky caught my eye. it was moving very slowly just below the clouds and sometimes would go into the clouds, then come out again in and up and down and straight pattern, then it moved backward slightly and i realized it was not a plane.  i saw no wings or tail, but it looked like a cigar shaped silver thing.  very large, like the size of two or three 747's.  all of a sudden, after it moved backwards, it shot forward very very fast, then 90 degrees to the right, and 90 degrees forward again and dissapeared.  i'd say it was going many times faster than a jet fighter.  i've never seen anything like it.  other people must have seen it, too.  now i'm a believer in ufos.
content.summary: Fast moving object changed direction several times

content.detailedDescription: The witness called me to discuss sightings he has been having since 2006 until now all over the state.  he has seen multiple numbers of large lighted orbs, the smallest one being 15 feet in diameter, up to 25 or 30 feet in diameter.  the first sighting involved a very close encounter with the light, and since then he sees lights following him in his vehicle whereever he travels in missouri an nearby states.  he is a boiler engineer for power plants and does a lot of travel.  the balls of light simply appear and dissapear, and do not move away.  they start out as a blue color, then change to red, then yellow.
content.summary: Multiple sightings of large balls of light since 2006 in missouri and other states

content.detailedDescription:
The ufo was in the sky moving to left and right
and few senconds later the thing vanish
i dont now nothing more
and my english isn't very good
i am afraid and i want help to soluve the ufos mysteries i dont like ufos but now i am a fan o then
content.summary: Like an egg, green and red.

content.detailedDescription: I was on a business trip in michigans upper peninsula, in an area known as the keewaknaw peninsula. this is the northermost portion of the upper peninsula, and is sparsely populated. my 16 y/o son was with me. we were driving back from agate beach on a remote back road, approx. 20 miles from the only main highway in that region, hwy 41. it was 8:07 pm, est. the orange light first appeared at this time. it was off to our right side, over the lake. we were ascending in elevation from the lake and had a beautiful view of an expanse of lake superior. the light was out over the lake. it seemed to large to be aircraft lights, and was moving in a slow, irregular pattern. the light seemed to be a long distance away, and getting a perspective of its size in relation to distance away was difficult, for its size and intensity of light was changing so rapidly. my son and i became somewhat nervous, becuase we were literally in the middle of nowhere. the nearest house with occupants was maybe 6 miles away. by the time we arrived at hwy 41, the orange light moved inland and was to our south, still visible the entire time, now seeming to stay in one spot. about 12 miles soth on hwy 41, there was a large valley with steep hills on both sides, which is about 4 mies across. when we got to the top of the other side of that valley, the orange light had disapeared. jupiter was now visible, low in the eastern sky. about 10 minutes later, the orange light appeared to our east. it was very large now, and the color was very intense. both the light and jupiter were visible. the light began to move close to the horizon, and seemed to be following the terrain. both my son and i were becoming really "weirded out". the light stayed in the eastern sky another 40 minutes, then suddenly dissapeared. it seemed it had just "gone out", it had not moved. 5 minutes or so later we arrived in the small town of bruce crossing, which consisted of a bar and a small truck stop. we stopped here to use the bathroom, and asking the person at the counter if anyone had seen anything, a trucker mentioned that, as traveling west on hwy 28, he had seen "a large orange ball to the east". as we got to our van, i looked east and saw nothing. we then turned onto hwy 28, westbound. about 5 minutes later my son yelled out "look behind us, there it is!" as i looked the east over my shoulder, i noticed an intense, small red light, just above the trees, just to our south, and the orange light was in the east, higher in the sky than previously. i pulled to the side of the road to text my wife (we now had signal for the first time since houghton) and tell her what was happening. it was 11pm est. when the van came to a stop, the red light was gone. when i finished my text and began driving, the red light "came on". my window was down, so it wasnt a reflection. a minute or so later my son yelled "what the hell is that!?", and was watching a small, intense white light moving crazily through the trees, to our right. this white light zipped over, and around our van, while the red light to our left stayed motionless. the red light seemed very close, and the white light seemed to be the size of a softball. as the white light moved into the trees, it lit up a small area dimly wherever it went. i began to think i should turn around and get back to bruce crossing, as the next town was 12 miles away on hwy 28. i texted my wife " i am afraid" at 11:10 est, which she received at 11:13, cst, she texted back at 11:15(time on my phone),  asking if we were ok, and she recieved my response of "i'm really scared" at 11:18. but upon looking at what time i sent that text, my phone showed 11:40. we arrived in the next town, bergland, where we were staying at a friends motel for the night, at 11:51. the lights were gone, and seem to have been gone for maybe 10 minutes, or so. i cannot explain the extra time it took to travel between the 2 towns, nor can either my son or i remember exactly how the lights disapeared. the next morning as we left, heading back to minneapolis, i began to get the feeling i had been "read" by the red light. i cannot explain it any other way. my sons memory of the incident and mine match up until the last part with the red and white lights. looking back and remembering, my son nor i felt terror, as much as just scared, and in awe of the whole situation.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Objects. first solid orange, second solid red, third solid white.

content.detailedDescription:
My name is *(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms). i was camping last weekend with my wife, daughter, and a family that we know well. we were out a bit west of lake george.

while we were hanging around the campfire, i took to looking at the sky. i love looking at stars and like to see if i can see satellites and other phenomena. i also have trained my eyes to cue in on movement due to many years hunting experience.

so, i was looking up at the sky while we were all talking and i saw a very small star apparently move.

however, it was not an airplane, (i saw several while we were there) and it was not a satellite, as i have seen many of those as well.

this star was moving back and forth, up and down, diagonally, slow and fast. the funny thing was it stayed in a fairly well defined area.

as i looked up, the area of movement would be similar to holding up a tennis ball at arm's length. within this area, this star moved erratically, and was not predictable.

for a while no one else could see what i was pointing out, but my wife and the mother of the other family finally saw what i was seeing.

they also said they could see this star move back and forth, up and down, fast and slow, etc.
i was open to the possibility that it was an optical illusion, but that was the only star moving in such a way in the entire sky. i was also open to the possibility of it being the clouds moving but the clouds moved on and the star stayed in the same relative position for almost two hours. all the other stars slowly orbited, but this stayed in the same area. 

i don't know if anyone else has seen such a thing, or if anyone else reported seeing something unusual on saturday, august 21st, 2010.

i just wanted to know if you have heard of anything like this.

i pride myself in being observant, and an amateur astronomer. i am very interested in space and astronomy, and love to look at stars. also know that i was a data analyst, and am able to observe things.

i would be interested in your opinion.

thank you very much,
content.summary: A small star or satellite

content.detailedDescription: we saw some type of ufo tonight that had bright red lights on it-- date: aug.31,2010, over clovis,ca at 11:10pm. it seemed to be more than two air- craft flying in tight formation.  it appeared in the western sky and traveled silently and swiftly going south. we could not see the shape of the aircraft as it was too far away. it seemed to decend slightly, while going southward, and disappeared behind trees and rooftops until we could no longer see it. the red lights on this were vivid, like the red of a stop light. the lights seemed to flutter back and forth in an almost strobe light effect.  the aircraft was silent, and although traveling very fast, we heard no jet engins. these were not helicopters as they were completely silent, nor was it a commercial plane with steady beacon lights. we don't know what kind of aircraft it was-- some new, silent military plane they are taking out on manuvers maybe? this was a lot like the first sighting we had a few days ago of a similar aircraft with red lights on it.
content.summary: Red lights over clovis, ca.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving back home from the naval base on 32nd street along harbor drive towards downtown and i noticed a very bright orange-ish orb in the western sky. at first, i thought it was one of the airplanes making a landing at the airport, but it ended up just sitting there in the same spot of the sky for the majority of the drive. it wasn't until i made it home that it began to move which was a solid 30 minutes after i first spotted it. after it began to move it immediately got dimmer as it moved faster until it disappeared altogether.

i know i described it as a "orange" orb, but that's mostly because orange was the primary color. the center of it was predominantly orange while the outside was constantly changing colors from blue to green to red, ect. it wasn't so much individual lights around the object that i could see as much as it was more of an "aura" around it. it shone very intensely as if it was molten, much too bright to be a chinese lantern. i was not able to get any pictures as i was driving and my phone camera is pretty terrible at night.

i felt the need to report it after reading multiple reports of similar objects in the area recently.
content.summary: Large bright orange orb spotted in western san diego sky.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
So you understand better this information. i have seen numerous 'objects'. i have filed two previous reports. one of which that caused some unwanted attention. (the red object staying in my line of sight) no matter how much effort i gave to move my seat into a position out of view. without pointing my seat in the completely opposite direction in the sky... since seeing these objects i was first afraid but have accepted(trying to) they have been there since before i became 'aware'. i have found myself asking to see them when i have had a bad or would just like some comfort. either way they show up. sometimes they will come very close and stop their "ship", possibly receiving my feelings. (if i become afraid they will move further away). back to what happen. i was thinking it would be peaceful to see one right now. i look up (west ward in the sky) and one appeared. it was first far away but came closer... occasionally when i see them or more so when i am asking to observe one, the lights in my vicinity will dim momentary... i have a question.. after i made two previous reports there have been helicopters after i have any close sightings.. there are now also extremely high flying aircraft that will fly in a grid around the perimeter of my house. with only a single flashing light, which makes them difficult to notice because they are at such a high altitude. anyway, when those planes are there i am unable to make contact with them visually. 
1. backyard. night
2.It began moving moved closer to the ground and stopped above me ( not directly above me). although that occurs.
3. i knew what it was.
4. appeared in the western sky, moved easternly and came 'close'.
5. peaceful, but alert.
6. it acceded back into the sky and went to its previous location of where i first noticed it.
content.summary: Object appeared after a few moments of looking into the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my front porch at approximately ten pm when i noticed a bright star-like object approaching from the sw banking to its left to take a due north trajectory over the west side of the city. moving at approximately the same velocity as a private airplane it remained in my line of sight for at least 30 seconds. the further north it flew the more it began banking to its right arcing until it assumed a due south flight where it flew almost directly over head. during its northerly flight it disappeared for approximately 10 seconds then reappeared as brightly as it did when i first observed it. this took place as it flew over the vicinity of the united states air force academy.
as it flew south overhead it made no sound, did not have navigation lights and it had the appearance of the flashing of an arc welder that is to say that it varied in intensity at times brighter than any other celestial body including jupiter. within 10 seconds of flying overhead, its brightness intensified  for a few seconds then abruptly and completely disappeared.From what i have seen previously in the skies over colorado springs the object certainly was identical to previous objects that i have seen overhead. this is how i recognizes the object to be another ufo.  this is the third time i have witnessed this type of sighting with this type of object but it left me with a sense of awe as much as the first time i saw one. one last note... the city has five major military installations in and around it including norad in cheyenne mountain... this object emerged from the mountains in the vicinity just north of the norad installation.
content.summary: Bright  ufo emerging from the mountains in a lazy "s" shape trajectory over the city of colorado springs.

content.detailedDescription:
We live on the east side of a lake in northern columbia county in new york state. from where we are located, we have an unobstructed view of the western sky. on the night of saturday august 28, 2010, the skies were clear with temps in the low 70's.

at about 9:25 that evening, i went outside to get something out of my truck. we had been cooking and canning vegetables from our garden all day, and the house was quite warm inside. noticing how pleasantly cool it was outside, i asked my girlfriend if she might like to come outside for a while to cool off.

as we stood down by the water, chatting and looking at the house lights from across the lake, something caught my eye in the west northwestern night sky. 

at an elevation of about fifty degrees, a bright white star-like object had suddenly appeared, seemingly out of nowhere.

had this object been stationary, and not as bright, i might have mistaken it for just a large star. but it was not stationary. it was moving in a northerly direction at what appeared to be a very high rate of speed.

after about three or four seconds from the time it first appeared, it executed a very tight, almost flat, 180 degree turn to the south, and after proceeding in this new direction for another three or four seconds, it just as suddenly seemed to "turn off" again, just like someone turning off a light switch, and became invisible to our eyes once more in the night sky.

please understand that when i used the word "turn", i am not speaking of any kind of a turn in the conventional way. this object, whatever it was, had managed to accomplish a complete and opposite change of direction in less than a second. it's speed remained constant throughout the entire manuver, and it's motion can only be described as "fluid".

as we stood there in silence for perhaps fifteen seconds or so, trying to comprehend what this actually was that we had just witnessed, another bright white "star"  "turned on" in the west southwestern sky.

i took this to be the same object that we had seen before, as the size and light intensity were the same, as was it's elevation above the horizon.

this time however, the same manuver that we had just witnessed was being repeated in reverse, with the object making another of those "impossible" 180 degree turns, and heading back to the north again before "turning off" once more.

we stood there for several more minutes watching the sky, but it did not reappear again.
content.summary: Bright star-like object seen executing high speed maneuvers in the skies over columbia county, ny.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving north on the 110 fwy when i noticed a huge circular disc-shaped cloud very low over downtown la. the strange thing was, there was not a single other cloud in the sky...Typical alien mistake if you ask me, they are as imperfect as us with just fancier aircraft... anyway, i have read several articles and seen photos of other cloud cloaked ufo's, hence, i knew what i was looking at immediately when i saw it. although i was driving, i reached into the back seat, grabbed my digital camera and snapped these pictures through the front window of my jeep. i took 4 pics, but these 3 are the ones that came out in focus.
zoom in on these pics. the closer you look the more it looks like a disc!
the cloud cloaked ufo did not move at all. it simply hovered in place. i drove up the highway and went on my way so it was only in my sight for a few seconds before i was past and i didn't want to turn and take more pics and risk crashing on the freeway...No "ignorant of human civilization" greys are going to ruin my day.
my feelings? i wasn't that surprised, it's my 5th sighting and i am used to being "in the ant farm" now. just like my first sighting of a transparent cloaked triangle with cloud in it on a clear night, these aliens messed up again by disguising themselves as a cloud on a cloudless day...Morons.  humans rule the galaxy
content.summary: Cloud cloaked ufo hovering over downtown la

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were outside smoking a cigarette in the backyard when he saw a strange red/orange glowing light. it was similar to the two lights i told him i had seen the week before, but no one believed me (around the same time almost a week before). the first one was coming towards us and then a plane flew parallel and the ufo shot up and away from us, turning into what looked like a satellite. after that experience, two more, flying very close to each other came toward us. the smaller of the two dimmed out before the larger and closer one moved to the left and dimmed out. it gave off a flash a couple of times before it too looked like a satellite. we watched it until we could no longer see it. we have a few photographs and a video but my husband was shaking so bad the pictures did not turn out so well. 
when i had seen two objects the week before (by myself) no one had believed me and told me they were flares. these objects were not flares. they had movement to them that are indescribable. i was starting to believe i imagined them until my husband and i saw them again! finally, i knew i was not imagining them! my husband and i were both in the military (in air department) and my husband works for a government-contracting agency. these ���orbs��� were not anything we have seen before.
the video does not do the siting justice. it looks so much smaller than how it was seen visually. it was the size of a man's pinky nail!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 fire shaped lights.

content.detailedDescription: While taking an evening walk, i looked up and saw a rectangle shaped object moving eastwast across the sky.  it seem to have a squared edge with 4 circular lights then a gap the same width and then 4 more circular lights across the edge. i was thinking about all the things it couldbe...I.E. a spider web across my eye sight, a reflection from a plane, a plane, but they were quickily ruled out. i was keenly focusing on it as it was about to reach a tree line and before it reached the trees it seemed to evaporate.
content.summary: Rectangle shaped object  with 8 circular lights across it with a gap between them moving across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were standing outside of my house at around 8:30 looking for the space station that was supposed to be visible tonight. we couldn't see anything so everyone went inside after a little while except for me. all of a sudden i saw this star-like light in the sky shooting up from the horizon and went to grab everyone because i thought it was the space station. the light is flickering in a reddish-orange color, and every now and then there will be tiny white flashes of light that appear around it and then vanish. my dad came out and we stood there watching it move up higher into the sky, when we realized it was moving in a really odd pattern, and thinking it may not actually be the space station. the only way i can describe it is the way a fly moves when its buzzing around, going back and forth and all around. after watching it move like this for a good 15 minutes, we concluded that it couldn't be the space station since it was only supposed to be visible for 3-4 minutes. it kept moving until it was straight up in the middle of the sky, and then it just stopped. my dad went back inside and i stayed outside watching it, and it would move back and forth every now and then, but for the most part it stays in the same area. i grabbed one of my friends to get another witness to make sure it wasn't just my eyes playing tricks on me, and he was able to see it moving as well, confirming the same times and directions it was moving as i was seeing it. i came inside to write this and to charge my camera to try and capture a video of it. when i went back outside, it had moved a little to the north, but it's still in the same general area. for it to move that quickly when we first spotted it in a matter of seconds, only for it to remain in the same area for almost 2 hours now tells me that it's not a star or any known aircraft. i wasn't able to get a video of it since it is too high up in the sky, but hopefully others have witnessed the same thing as i have.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looking for the space station.

content.detailedDescription:
While performing maintenance on my vehicle in my driveway just before one o'clock in the afternoon,  i raised my head to clean my sunglasses (hot day)and noticed three perfect white spheres high to the northwest of my yard ,i would describe as possibly floating?

within moments my father came by  and he also saw the spheres, by this time (about 5 min. had gone by) a perfect red sphere arrived and started circling the first much larger white sphere. 

it seemed  to disappear and re-appear with rapid motion inside the first white sphere!?

the whole encounter lasted about twenty minutes and gave me the time to run in and retrieve my 10x50 tasco binoculars and observe them holding the binocs against the door of my truck to keep them steady.Not long after i lost all four in the treeline.

the sky was almost cloudless, with the sun to my back

we both feel very lucky to have seen these perfect objects and only noticed afterwards how many people i left frantic messages from my cell phone to run outside and look up to the northwest sky..
content.summary: 3 white spheres very high up being circled by a smaller 4th red sphere.

content.detailedDescription:
The object was moving very strange he went to a point in the sky and returned to the original color shone like those of a star (red, green and blue) after about 20 seconds he went south and disappeared from my view . me and a friend but not actually witness the time and i take pictures or something.
i do not particularly interested in ufos but this event made me you could contact them
thanks for the support
* i liked the site *
content.summary: Has an egg form and this movements is impossible!!! the ufo go and back!!

content.detailedDescription: I was in the kitchen making a peanut butter sandwich, i went over to the sink to fill the kettle for my cuppa and i saw a light in the sky through the window. i thought it was a plane at 1st but then realised it was 2 bright so i turned out...  the light and opened the window so i could see it better, there was no sound, it was quite close, had no wings, was travelling quite fast and then it faded away up into the sky rather quickly. there are no clouds in the sky so didn't dissapear behind any clouds. i always have a scepticle eye over these things but i'm at a loss to explain this one, i have seen similar things before but in the distance, this time was close then dissapeared in seconds into the sky...
content.summary: Bright light low then faded into space.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at fords ball park in hamilton, oh. attending a softball game in which two co-workers and friend were playing. i left before the game ended and was walking up an incline toward the gravel lot where i was parked,when out of the corner of my eye to the left (west) i noticed a grayish blue object descending slowly and silently less than 100 yards from me. iimmediately stopped near the top of the hill and blinked once in amazement at what i was seeing. this object was a solid disc shaped blueish, grayish color. i would estimate at arms lenghth the object was about the size of my hand. as it descended it wnet behind a row of trees on the south bank of the old erie canal. as it descended behind the trees it "lit up" white like a search light. at this time i could hear what sounded like the leaves and branches of the trees "crackling" as if they were being sered.By now the hair was standing on the back of my neck.The object continued to descend and the only place it could have gone was under the water in the canal. i thought "what the hell did i just see"!
there were a few people in the lot but had there backs to the object. i didn't say anything, just got in my car and went home. the next day at work one of my friends that i went to watch play ball the night before approached me with a strange look on his face. i said , "you saw it too, didn't you."! he said ,"what the heck was that?" i said," i don't know". we never talked about it again.
content.summary: Silent  metalic disc shape descended from west and disappeared in old erie canal.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on the second level deck of a time share condo at westmark in north depot bay. we were right on the pacific ocean and i was taking a great many pictures of the ocean, birds, sea lions, and the sky over the three day stay.  the object was not noticable when the picture was taken. in similiar photos where birds were in flight, they could be seen through the camera lens. the picture in question was looking southwest at the time. when i finished taking pictures that morning, i checked the pictures taken on the cameras viewing play back position.  the object appeared in the upper left corner of the shot. i encreased the size of the photo and what appeared was not a bird or a plane. when i returned home to junction city, oregon the photos were down loaded to my desk top pc. nothing has been done to the picture. it appears to me to be an oval disk of some sore being thicker in the center. no clouds were near it and the only sound we heard was the ocean.  small planes and helicopters were easy to identify. the used is an hp photosmard r847 8.0 mega pixels.
nothing like this object was seen in any of the other pictures taken of the sky on those three days. 194 total.

i have printed the photo but i am having trouble attaching it to this message.  any suggestions?
content.summary: The object was not seen through camera lens when picture taken.
